data.lyric:
[ti:Unlonely]
[ar:Jason Mraz]
[al:Unlonely]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Unlonely - Jason Mraz (杰森·玛耶兹)
[00:05.13]Lyricist：Emily Warren/Scott Harris/Jason Mraz/Andrew Wells
[00:10.27]It could be love
[00:12.34]And we could be homies
[00:14.78]Once you get to know me
[00:17.42]I could be your one and only
[00:19.22]I could make you unlonely
[00:21.35]Or we could take it slowly
[00:24.78]And we could keep it low key
[00:27.12]I could be your one and only
[00:29.00]I could make you unlonely
[00:31.47]I've been chasing summer around
[00:33.86]Searching for the sunshine
[00:35.25]Looking for a good time
[00:36.40]Following the good vibes
[00:37.65]Listening to intuition as it's happening
[00:40.07]Diggin' into life cuz at times it can be saddening
[00:42.44]Yeah it can be a grey day
[00:44.13]If you're lonely
[00:45.32]A little rain suddenly turns heavy
[00:47.39]But a whole lot of love can make the clouds go away
[00:49.86]Maybe the time for us is now
[00:52.18]When the table's set for two
[00:54.16]And there's nobody with you
[00:56.58]Seeing movies by yourself
[00:59.09]Let me be your someone else
[01:01.55]It could be love
[01:04.05]And we could be homies
[01:06.02]Once you get to know me
[01:08.77]I could be your one and only
[01:10.63]I could make you unlonely
[01:12.83]Or we could take it slowly
[01:16.18]And we could keep it low key
[01:18.50]I could be your one and only
[01:20.37]I could make you unlonely
[01:22.59]Love la la la la love
[01:27.01]Love la la love
[01:29.14]One and only I could make you unlonely
[01:31.63]I give you my word although I'm making words up
[01:33.59]Unlonely ain't a word
[01:34.99]But I don't give a f**k
[01:36.15]Cause I'm fresh from the farm where critics can't bother me
[01:38.88]Living is tricky as it is so that ain't stopping me
[01:41.35]You and me we both agree
[01:42.47]That no one needs the scrutiny
[01:43.63]All we want is peace and love
[01:44.96]And honestly you ruin me
[01:46.11]With your beautiful smile
[01:47.06]And your style continuity
[01:48.70]I'd be a fool not to take the opportunity to say
[01:51.67]Hey we should be homies
[01:53.58]I think we could be bigger than cheese and macaroni
[01:55.98]We could keep it sweet like Chachi and Joanie
[01:58.41]Oh maybe just be ourselves never phony
[02:00.96]Never second guessing the friendship connection
[02:03.28]Parallel living
[02:04.58]Never in possesion of your individual personal expression
[02:08.17]Together we're just a much better reflection of
[02:10.77]Love
[02:12.32]And we could be homies
[02:14.73]Once you get to know me
[02:17.44]I could be your one and only
[02:19.15]I could make you unlonely
[02:21.31]Or we could take it slowly
[02:24.81]And we could keep it low key
[02:27.08]I could be your one and only
[02:28.93]I could make you unlonely
[02:31.09]Love la la la la love
[02:35.82]Love la la love
[02:37.67]One and only I could make you unlonely
[02:40.73]Love la la la la love
[02:45.58]Love la la love
[02:47.44]One and only I could make you unlonely
[02:49.66]When the table's set for two
[02:51.71]And there's nobody with you
[02:54.22]Seeing movies by yourself
[02:56.66]Let me be your someone else
[02:59.07]If you're spending time alone
[03:01.45]If it's just you and your phone
[03:03.97]Taking pictures of yourself
[03:06.42]Baby maybe I can help
[03:08.80]It could be love
[03:11.41]And we could be homies
[03:13.46]Once you get to know me
[03:16.06]I could be your one and only
[03:17.88]I could make you unlonely
[03:20.09]Or we could take it slowly
[03:23.58]And we could keep it low key
[03:26.03]I could be your one and only
[03:27.63]I could make you unlonely
[03:29.95]Love la la la la love
[03:34.61]Love la la love
[03:36.37]One and only I could make you unlonely
[03:39.12]It could be love
[03:39.73]Love la la la la love
[03:41.13]And we could be homies
[03:42.86]Once you get to know me
[03:44.54]Love la la love
[03:45.70]I could be your one and only
[03:47.29]I could make you unlonely
data.trans:
[ti:Unlonely]
[ar:Jason Mraz]
[al:Unlonely]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.13]//
[00:10.27]这可能就是爱
[00:12.34]我们就是爱人
[00:14.78]一旦你开始了解我
[00:17.42]我可以成为你的唯一
[00:19.22]让你告别孤单
[00:21.35]我们可以慢慢来
[00:24.78]低调一些
[00:27.12]我可以成为你的唯一
[00:29.00]让你告别孤单
[00:31.47]我一直在追逐夏季的步伐
[00:33.86]寻找阳光
[00:35.25]想找一个好时机
[00:36.40]跟从心灵共鸣
[00:37.65]当爱情发生 听从直觉的指引
[00:40.07]发掘生活的美 因为有时会有伤心事情发生
[00:42.44]是的 也许会是阴天
[00:44.13]如果你感到孤单
[00:45.32]淅淅小雨突然变成强暴雨
[00:47.39]但是爱能将乌云驱散
[00:49.86]也许现在就是属于你我的时刻
[00:52.18]这张桌子为你我而制
[00:54.16]你身边没有人
[00:56.58]独自看电影
[00:59.09]让我成为你的“某人”吧
[01:01.55]这可能就是爱
[01:04.05]我们就是爱人
[01:06.02]一旦你开始了解我
[01:08.77]我可以成为你的唯一
[01:10.63]让你告别孤单
[01:12.83]我们可以慢慢来
[01:16.18]低调一些
[01:18.50]我可以成为你的唯一
[01:20.37]让你告别孤单
[01:22.59]爱啊 爱啊
[01:27.01]爱啊 爱啊
[01:29.14]唯一的人 让你告别孤单
[01:31.63]我会对你表露心意 尽管我还在组织语言
[01:33.59]告别孤单不是一个词
[01:34.99]但我才不管
[01:36.15]因为我是一个刚从田间来的小伙 城里的这些并不会影响我
[01:38.88]生活不易 但这也不能阻止我
[01:41.35]你我都同意
[01:42.47]没有人需要被审查
[01:43.63]我们想要的只有爱与和平
[01:44.96]老实说 你毁了我
[01:46.11]用你那美丽的笑脸
[01:47.06]你还在继续
[01:48.70]我就是个傻瓜 没有抓住机会对你说
[01:51.67]我们成为恋人吧
[01:53.58]我想我们会比奶酪和通心粉更配
[01:55.98]可以像Chachi和Joanie一样甜蜜
[01:58.41]或许做我们自己就好 不用伪装
[02:00.96]不要猜疑我们之间的情谊
[02:03.28]平行世界
[02:04.58]永远不要只顾自己的想法
[02:08.17]齐心协力 效果会更好
[02:10.77]爱
[02:12.32]我们就是爱人
[02:14.73]一旦你开始了解我
[02:17.44]我可以成为你的唯一
[02:19.15]让你告别孤单
[02:21.31]我们可以慢慢来
[02:24.81]低调一些
[02:27.08]我可以成为你的唯一
[02:28.93]让你告别孤单
[02:31.09]爱啊 爱啊
[02:35.82]爱啊 爱啊
[02:37.67]唯一的人 让你告别孤单
[02:40.73]爱啊 爱啊
[02:45.58]爱啊 爱啊
[02:47.44]唯一的人 让你告别孤单
[02:49.66]这张桌子为你我而制
[02:51.71]你身边没有人
[02:54.22]独自看电影
[02:56.66]让我成为你的“某人”吧
[02:59.07]若你独自一人生活
[03:01.45]只有你和你的手机
[03:03.97]自己拍照
[03:06.42]宝贝 或许我能帮忙
[03:08.80]这可能就是爱
[03:11.41]我们就是爱人
[03:13.46]一旦你开始了解我
[03:16.06]我可以成为你的唯一
[03:17.88]让你告别孤单
[03:20.09]我们可以慢慢来
[03:23.58]低调一些
[03:26.03]我可以成为你的唯一
[03:27.63]让你告别孤单
[03:29.95]爱啊 爱啊
[03:34.61]爱啊 爱啊
[03:36.37]唯一的人 让你告别孤单
[03:39.12]这可能就是爱
[03:39.73]爱啊 爱啊
[03:41.13]我们就是爱人
[03:42.86]一旦你开始了解我
[03:44.54]爱啊 爱啊
[03:45.70]我可以成为你的唯一
[03:47.29]让你告别孤单
